org.apache.flex.swf.tags

Class DefineFontTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.Tag
      • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.CharacterTag
        • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.DefineFontTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharacterTag, IDefineFontTag, ITag
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefineFont2Tag

    public class DefineFontTag
extends CharacterTag
implements IDefineFontTag
    Represents a DefineFont tag in a SWF file.

    The DefineFont tag defines the shape outlines of each glyph used in a particular font. Only the glyphs that are used by subsequent DefineText tags are actually defined.
